src:
海老沼また２位も…ＧＳ大阪でストップ大野将平「（五輪内定）全力で阻止する」

02 Nov 2019

　「柔道・講道館杯全日本体重別選手権」（２日、千葉ポートアリーナ）
　東京五輪代表１次選考会を兼ねて行われた。男子７３キロ級は、６６キロ級五輪２大会連続メダルの海老沼匡（２９）＝パーク２４＝が決勝まで勝ち進んだものの、最後は原田健士（日体大）に合わせ技一本で敗れて準優勝。ただ、２次選考会となるグランドスラム（ＧＳ）大阪大会（２２～２４日）出場には望みをつないだ。
　またも“鬼門”の決勝で苦杯を喫した。海老沼はリオデジャネイロ五輪後に階級を上げて以降まだ国内外で優勝がなく、２位はこれで６度目。最も勝ち上がるのが難しいとされる講道館杯で持ち味は発揮し、「厳しい組み合わせの中で決勝まで勝ってこられたことは自信にしたい」と振り返りつつ、Ｖ逸が続いていることについては「実力不足です。もっと決勝（で勝ち切るため）の気持ちをつくらないといけない」と首をひねった。
　東京五輪代表争いでは、リオ五輪王者で今夏の世界王者である大野将平（旭化成）、１７年世界王者の橋本壮市（パーク２４）を追う立場だが、今回２位に入ったことで各階級４枠のＧＳ大阪代表には選ばれる可能性は残した。五輪代表に王手を懸けている大野とは過去１勝３敗ではあるが、毎回接戦を演じているだけに、「大阪で大野（将平）選手が優勝したら（五輪代表に）決まってしまうので、全力で阻止します」と不退転の決意を示した。
　ＧＳ大阪代表は３日の全試合終了後に強化委員会を経て決まる。
text:
Ebinuma and the second place ... Stop at GS Osaka Shohei Ohno "(Olympic end) stop with full power"

02 Nov 2019

”Judo / Kodokan Cup All Japan Weight Championship” (2nd, Chiba Port Arena)
It was also held as the first selection meeting for the Tokyo Olympics. The men's 73-kilometer class won the 66-kilometer class Olympic 2 Games consecutive medal Ebinuma Kei (29) = Park 24 = to the final, but in the end he was defeated by a single technique in line with Kenji Harada (Nichitai Univ.). Winner. However, I hoped to participate in the Grand Slam (GS) Osaka tournament (22-24 days), which will be the second screening.
Again, I had a hard time in the final of “Kimmon”. Ebinuma has not won the championship in Japan and overseas since raising his rank after the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, and this is his sixth place. The Kudokan Cup, which is said to be the most difficult to win, will show its uniqueness. Looking back, "I want to be confident that I won the final in a tough combination" “It ’s not enough. We have to make more feelings for the final (to win in)”.
In the Tokyo Olympics fight, the championship of Rio Olympic champion and world champion of summer this year, Shohei Ohno (Asahi Kasei), and 17-year world champion Souichi Hashimoto (Park 24), but by entering the second place each class He left the possibility of being chosen by the 4-frame GS Osaka National Team. Ohno, who has won the championship of the Olympics, has been in the past 1 wins and 3 losses, but only because he has played close matches every time, “If the player Ohno (Shohei) wins in Osaka, it will be decided by the Olympics) I will stop with all my power, "he said.
GS Osaka National Team will be decided through the Reinforcement Committee after all the matches on the 3rd.
